cancel_dialog.title: Cancel Upgrade Request
cancel_dialog.description:
Are you sure you want to cancel this upgrade request?

IMPORTANT: Only proceed if you have NOT already sent a cryptocurrency payment for this upgrade. If you have already initiated a crypto payment, please do not cancel the upgrade request as it may cause issues with payment processing.

If you haven't made any payment yet, it's safe to proceed with the cancellation.

message.description: Your e-mail address has not been verified. Check your mailbox for the activation e-mail.
message.success: New activation e-mail has been sent

accounting.title: Your Crypto Accounting, Done Right, By the People Who Built rotki
accounting.intro: Crypto accounting isn’t plug-and-play. Every portfolio is unique, and getting it right means going deep: cleaning messy data, classifying complex events and ensuring your numbers actually make sense. Since 2017, rotki has helped users take control of their crypto finances. Now, for those who need hands-on help, we offer bespoke accounting services using rotki itself and tailored scripts to deliver complete, accurate results.

tailored.title: Tailored To Your Needs
tailored.description: No two portfolios are the same. We work with your exact data, wallets, CSVs, DeFi positions, NFTs and customize every step to match your accounting requirements.

scripts.title: Built on rotki + Scripts
scripts.description: We use rotki as the accounting engine, enhanced with custom scripts and tooling tailored to your case. The result: accurate, explainable data that you can use for your specific use case. You get both the data back and the scripts we made for you for reproducability.

hands_on.title: Hands-On Service
hands_on.description: This isn’t SaaS. It's a service. We work directly with you: identify edge cases, fix data problems, label transactions, track missing histories, and explain every number.

privacy.title: Privacy First, Always
privacy.description: Your data stays with us. No uploads to third-party cloud tools. Everything is processed locally or on secure infrastructure we control. Your data is all deleted once we complete the job for you. Your privacy and peace of mind is our top priority.

formalization.title: Our Approach
formalization.description: rotki has always been about empowering users with accurate, private, local-first accounting tools. But not everyone has the time or expertise to dig into every transaction, match LP positions, or chase down lost CSVs. If you want your crypto accounting done with you or for you, using the same tools we’ve built and trusted for years, we’re here to help. We’ve worked with individuals, teams, and DAOs to get their books in order, clean, audit-ready, and future-proof. Not by using generic tax software but just with a deep understanding of the crypto landscape and a commitment to doing it right.

contact.message: Or, you can email us at {email} with a short summary of your situation.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.intro: Crypto accounting is complicated. We make it simple, by doing it right. This is a premium, hands-on service where we take your data, analyze it in depth, and deliver clear, accurate results you can trust.

initial_consultation.title: Initial Consultation
initial_consultation.description: The initial consultation takes from 1-3 hours on average. We'll dig into your portfolio: review your rotki data, check your wallets, exchanges, and DeFi activity, and map out what needs to be done. You'll get a clear plan and an honest assessment of the work involved.

custom_quote.title: Custom Quote for the Full Job
custom_quote.description: After the consultation, we'll give you a tailored offer based on your situation. Not vague promises but just a fair price for the actual time and complexity. Whether it's a cleanup, a full accounting year, or ongoing help, we'll scope it together.

transparent_fair.title: Transparent and Fair
transparent_fair.description: If you decide not to proceed after the initial consultation, that's perfectly fine. You'll still leave with a clearer understanding of your accounting situation.

important_note.title: Important note
important_note.paragraph1: This is a crypto accounting and data preparation service. We help you organize, clean, and analyze your financial history so you (or your tax advisor) have a clear and complete picture.
important_note.paragraph2: We do not provide tax advice or file tax returns. For filing taxes, we recommend working with a qualified tax professional in your jurisdiction who can use the data we prepare for you. We can also work directly with your tax advisor if you need us to.

 This is not the same account as premium and credentials for one account do not work for the other. To use rotki simply {download} and run it. 

 Proceed only if you intend to purchase premium and unlock the premium features of the application.

notes.line_1: Please submit a payment request. Once that is done an email will be sent to your account with a payment request of the equivalent € amount of that cryptocurrency based on the rates given by CryptoCompare
notes.line_2: Once the whole amount is sent and processed by our system, then a receipt will be sent to your email and your subscription will be activated.
notes.line_3: Finally, when the end of the subscription period approaches an email with a prompt to generate another payment request will be sent.

step_3.title: Payment Details
step_3.upgrade_plan_description: Upgrade charges are calculated as the price difference between plans, prorated for your remaining subscription period. You'll only pay the difference for the time left in your current billing cycle.

wallet.notice: You can pay directly via your wallet or manually send the exact amount to the following address above. Once the whole amount is sent and processed by our system, then a receipt will be sent to your email and your subscription will be activated.
wallet.paid_notice_1: If you already have made a transaction you don't need to do anything more.
wallet.paid_notice_2: You will be notified about your subscription via e-mail as soon as your transaction is confirmed.

dex_support.detail:
See how much you have in each liquidity pool. All your LP join/exit events are shown along with the total profit/loss per pool.

DEX trades are taken into account in the tax report for premium users.
dex_support.title: Decentralized exchanges

graphs_and_statistics.detail:
Premium users can visit the graphs/statistics page and get graphs for:
Net worth over time
Asset amount and total asset value over time
Breakdown of total net worth per location
Breakdown of total net worth per asset
graphs_and_statistics.title: Graphs and statistics

history.detail: Free users have a limit on the number of transactions, deposits, withdrawals and other events they can see and process. Premium users have higher limits.
history.title: Higher limits for trades, transactions, deposits and withdrawals

premium_defi.detail: See the entire list of activities you have done when interacting with a DeFi protocol. Get the profit/loss report for each protocol. Set watchers for various protocols to be informed via email when certain conditions are met.
premium_defi.title: DeFi historical accounting, profit and loss

premium_staking.detail:
See how much of the token is staked per account.
What is the expected APR.
How much of the token you have earned by staking across all accounts.

See a list of all your staking events with links to the corresponding transactions.
premium_staking.title: Advanced staking

premium_features.subtitle: Enjoy all the potential that rotki offers.
premium_features.title: Premium features

pnl_explanation.title: Profit/loss report for your historical data
pnl_explanation.description:
A profit/loss report across all the user’s assets, protocols, exchanges and blockchains is created for the given time range. The results can be exported into a CSV file which can later be imported to a spreadsheet or shared directly with your accountant.

Profit/loss report for free users has a transaction limit and does not take into account all possible protocols.

free_vs_premium.title: Free vs. Premium:
free_vs_premium.description: Free users can generate reports with a transaction limit and partial protocol coverage. Upgrade to Premium for unlimited reporting and full protocol support.

profit_loss_report.title: Profit/loss report
profit_loss_report.subtitle: A profit/loss report for all your historical data

testimonials.detail: Hear from some of our amazing customers who are using rotki.
testimonials.title: Don’t just take our word for it

header.title: Compare our plans and find yours
header.heading: Pricing
header.description: Simple, transparent pricing that grows with you. Try any plan free for 30 days.

pricing.custom_plan_info: Contact us to get a custom plan that suits your needs.

products.description: Elevate your financial management with rotki premium, our exclusive subscription offering. Gain access to advanced tools and features designed to enhance the management of your portfolio and investments.

asset_amount_and_value.description: Access comprehensive analytics, including net value and asset amount over time for each owned asset.
asset_amount_and_value.title: Asset tracking

distribution_assets.description: View a distribution pie chart of your net value per assets.
distribution_assets.title: Value distribution (assets)

distribution_locations.description: View a distribution pie chart of your net value per location (exchanges, blockchain accounts, banks, etc.).
distribution_locations.title: Value distribution (locations)

events_analysis.description: View a summary of your activities, including ETH spent, exchanges/protocols used, and Gnosis Pay usage.
events_analysis.title: Events analysis

detailed_graphs.description: Access a wide array of analytics and graphs. Analyze your total net value over time, asset value distributions, and the worth distribution per asset or location.
detailed_graphs.title: Detailed Graphs

enriched_transactions.description: Connect your Monerium and Gnosis Pay accounts to automatically enrich your blockchain transactions with detailed metadata, including bank transfer details, credit card merchant data, and payment descriptions.
enriched_transactions.title: Enriched protocol transactions

events_analysis.description: View detailed insights about your activities, including ETH spent, exchanges/protocols used, number of transactions per chain, and Gnosis Pay usage.
events_analysis.title: Events Analysis

higher_limits.description: Say goodbye to limits. With rotki Premium, you can process more trades, transactions, deposits/withdrawals, and historic events. The limits increase with each premium tier, providing greater flexibility and control.
higher_limits.title: Higher Limits

history_view.description: Free users have a limit of the 100 most recent events in the history event viewer. As a premium user you have higher limits in the amount of events you can see.
history_view.title: History view

profit_loss_report.description: Free users are limited to the 100 most recent events in profit & loss report. Premium users benefit from higher limits for viewing events in profit & loss report.
profit_loss_report.title: Profit & loss report events

user_notes.description: Free users can add up to 10 notes. As a premium user, you have higher limits on the number of notes you can add.
user_notes.title: User notes

validators.description: Free users can only see 4 Ethereum validators. Premium users enjoy higher limits on the number of Ethereum validators visible.
validators.title: Ethererum Validators

data_synchronization.description: As a premium user, you can upload your encrypted database to our server, synchronize it across devices, and use it as a backup. Your data remains encrypted with your password, ensuring privacy. Synced databases are automatically deleted one month after your subscription expires.
data_synchronization.title: Data synchronization

monerium_and_backup.heading: Enrich Transactions and Synchronize Data

monerium_api_keys.description: Once you provide Monerium credentials as a premium user, all Monerium transactions on mainnet, Polygon, and Gnosis chain will be enriched with bank transfer data or chain bridging information.
monerium_api_keys.title: Monerium API Keys

monerium_and_backup.title: Monerium API Integration and Premium Data Backup

staking.description: Track your staking activities across various chains and platforms like ETH, Liquity, Kraken, and more. Get detailed insights on total gains, performance, rewards breakdown, and individual staking events.
staking.title: Staking

sync_db_with_server.description: Effortlessly back up your data to our cloud and sync or restore it across multiple devices. Your data is encrypted and can only be decrypted with your password, ensuring complete privacy.
sync_db_with_server.title: Sync data across multiple machines

theme_customization.description: Reduce eye strain, improve text readability, and prolong your device's battery life with dark mode. Personalize the color scheme for both light and dark modes, and customize specific color palettes for the app theme within the settings
theme_customization.title: Dark mode & theme customization

timeframe.description: Set the timeframe for the dashboard graph. Premium users have access to all options, while free users can choose between only "2 Weeks", and "1 Week".
timeframe.heading: Enhanced Customization Options
timeframe.title: Timeframe Customization on Dashboard

footer.description: Upgrade to rotki premium today and take your financial management to the next level. Enjoy enhanced features, greater flexibility, and exclusive perks designed for the modern investor.

products.heading: Unlock the Full Potential of rotki with Premium Features
products.title: Upgrade rotki today

unlock.description: Unlock the full potential of rotki with a premium subscription. Whether you're a seasoned investor or just starting out, rotki premium provides the tools and resources you need to succeed in today's dynamic financial landscape.
unlock.title: Unlock Premium Features

contact_section.subtitle: For media inquiries or additional information about rotki, please reach out to:
contact_section.title: Contact us

values.subtitle: Our mission is to empower users to take control of their finances both in and out of crypto in a transparent and auditable way while enabling them to own their data through a self-sovereign application.
values.title: Nice to meet you

values_section.description: We are driven by a set of core values that guide our every action and decision. Our commitment to these values is what sets us apart and ensures that our users receive the utmost quality and service.

line_1.title: We are:
line_1.value: a team of dedicated builders driven by our love for what we create. Our passion lies in developing applications that bring tangible value to our users. We believe in the power of open-source development, as it enables transparency, audibility, and the provision of user guarantees.

line_2.title: We build:
line_2.value:
- {open_source}: Because that's the only way to create transparent applications that can be audited and provide users with guarantees.
- {local_first}: Building local applications that store all data locally is the only way to guarantee data privacy and true ownership. Nobody can deny access to the app or the data to the user if it's a local application.

line_3.title: We welcome:
line_3.value:
external open-source contributors who understand our mission and utilise our product themselves, driven by the desire to help it reach its maximum potential.

Our team can independently shoulder their responsibilities, taking ownership of their work. We value teamwork and collaboration, emphasising the importance of collective effort rather than individual stardom.

values_section.title: Values

vision_section.description: rotki is the portfolio tracking, management and accounting tool for your finances. The one-stop app for viewing and managing your finances. rotki aspires to:

list.line_1: Be the one place to track your entire portfolio across on-chain crypto, banks, stocks, trades and more.
list.line_2: Allow you to manage your finances, perform trades across CEXes, on-chain swaps, and other brokers from one interface.
list.line_3: Create monthly/quarterly/yearly reports covering assets across all mentioned locations.
list.line_4: A modular system that many contributors outside our team can extend. For example, if someone wants to integrate tax accounting rules for a specific jurisdiction, they are experts on or integrate a chain they know of.

vision_section.title: Vision
